    • calculateWidth

      public static int calculateWidth(Font font, String t)
      Calculate the width of a span of text.
      Parameters:
      font - Font to use for text
      t - Text to calculate
      Returns:
      Width in pixels of text, or -1 if the font is missing a character.

    • calculateWidth

      public static int calculateWidth(Font font, String t, int cs)
      Calculate the width of a span of text.
      Parameters:
      font - Font to use for text.
      t - Text to calculate.
      cs - Character spacing.
      Returns:
      Width in pixels of text, or -1 if the font is missing a character.
